# mythicbeasts_vps (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

> **NOTE**: [Write-only arguments](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments) are supported in Terraform 1.11 and later.

- `disk_size` (Number, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Disk size, in MB; see the `mythicbeasts_vps_disk_sizes` data source for valid values
- `identifier` (String) A unique identifier for the server. This will form part of the hostname for the server, and must consist only of lower-case letters and digits and be at most 20 characters long
- `image` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Operating system image name; see the `mythicbeasts_vps_images` data source for valid values
- `name` (String)
- `product` (String) Virtual server product code; see the `mythicbeasts_vps_products` data source for valid values
- `ssh_keys` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Public SSH key(s) to be added to /root/.ssh/authorized_keys on server

### Optional

> **NOTE**: [Write-only arguments](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments) are supported in Terraform 1.11 and later.

- `boot_device` (String) Boot device
- `cpu_mode` (String) Possible values:
- `performance`
- `compatibility`
Default: `performance`
- `create_in_zone` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Zone (datacentre) code; see the `mythicbeasts_vps_zones` data source for valid values
- `disk_bus` (String) (Optional) Virtual disk bus adapter type
Possible values:
-`virtio`
-`sata`
-`scsi`
-`ide`
Default: `virtio`
- `host_server` (String) Name of private cloud host server to provision on; see the `mythicbeasts_hosts` data source for valid values
- `hostname` (String) Hostname the new server should be installed with
Default: `{identifier}.vs.mythic-beasts.com`
- `ipv4_enabled` (Boolean, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Whether or not to allocate an IPv4 address for this server; an IPv6 address will always be allocated; IPv4 is a chargeable option; see the `mythicbeasts_vps_pricing` data source for the price
- `net_device` (String) Virtual network device type
Possible values:
- `virtio`
- `e1000`
-`rtl8139`
- `ne2k_pci`
Default: `virtio`
- `set_forward_dns` (Boolean, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Whether to automatically add A/AAAA records for the server's IP addresses to the selected hostname
Default: `false`
- `set_reverse_dns` (Boolean, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Whether to automatically set reverse DNS for the server's IP addresses to the selected hostname
Default: `false`
- `ssh_proxy` (Attributes) SSH Proxy settings (for IPv4 access to IPv6-only servers) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssh_proxy))
- `tablet` (Boolean) Tablet mode for VNC mouse pointer
Default: `true`
- `user_data` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Stored user data ID or name; see the `mythicbeasts_user_data` datasource for valid values
- `user_data_string` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) User data (as a literal string)
- `vnc` (Attributes) VNC settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vnc))

### Read-Only

- `dormant` (Boolean) Whether the server is dormant
- `family` (String) Product family code
- `ipv4` (Set of String) List of IPv4 addresses, if IPv4 was enabled during creation
- `ipv6` (Set of String) List of IPv6 addresses
- `iso_image` (String) ISO image currently in virtual CD drive
- `macs` (List of String) List of MAC addresses
- `period` (String) Billing period
- `price` (Number) Price of server (pence per billing period)
- `specs` (Attributes) Server specs (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--specs))
- `zone` (Attributes) Zone (datacentre) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--zone))

<a id="nestedatt--ssh_proxy"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ssh_proxy`

Read-Only:

- `hostname` (String) SSH proxy hostname
- `port` (Number) SSH proxy port


<a id="nestedatt--vnc"></a>
### Nested Schema for `vnc`

Optional:

- `mode` (String) VNC mode
- `password` (String, Sensitive) VNC password

Read-Only:

- `display` (Number) VNC display number
- `ipv4` (String) VNC IPv4 address
- `ipv6` (String) VNC IPv6 address
- `port` (Number) VNC port number


<a id="nestedatt--specs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `specs`

Optional:

- `disk_size` (Number) Disk size in MB

Read-Only:

- `cores` (Number) Number of virtual CPU cores
- `disk_type` (String) Disk type
- `extra_cores` (Number) Number of CPU cores in addition to the ones provided by the base product (private cloud only)
- `extra_ram` (Number) Amount of RAM (in MB) in addition to the RAM provided by the base product (private cloud only)
- `ram` (Number) RAM size in MB


<a id="nestedatt--zone"></a>
### Nested Schema for `zone`

Read-Only:

- `code` (String) Zone Code
- `name` (String) Zone Name
